meanings.definition: A formal assurance that certain conditions will be fulfilled
meanings.sent1: The guaranties in the contract ensure the job will be done on time.
meanings.sent2: She provided guaranties that the product would work perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The guaranties in the agreement made everyone feel confident.
meanings.sent4: His reputation for honesty acts as a guaranty in all his dealings.
meanings.sent5: The guaranties given by the company were rock solid.

meanings.definition: Something that assures a particular outcome or condition
meanings.sent1: The insurance policy serves as a guaranty for financial security.
meanings.sent2: His smile was a guaranty of his happiness.
meanings.sent3: The lucky charm was her little guaranty for good luck.
meanings.sent4: The handshake was a guaranty of their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow was a beautiful guaranty of a sunny day ahead.
